mutants.code:
def count_distinct_pitches(n, s, queries):
    s.sort()
    qrs = []
    for (i, (l, r)) in enumerate(queries):
        qrs.append((r - l, i))
    qrs.sort()
    stoppers = sorted([s[i] - s[i - 1] for i in range(1, len(s))])
    stopper_sum = 1
    stopper_cnt = 0
    si = 0
    answers = []
    for (x, i) in qrs:
        while si < len(stoppers) and stoppers[si] <= x:
            stopper_cnt += 1
            stopper_sum += stoppers[si]
            si += 1
        answers.append((i, (x + 1) * (len(s) - stopper_cnt) + stopper_sum))
    answers.sort()
    return [x[1] for x in answers]

    stoppers = sorted([s[i] - s[i - 1] for i in range(1, len(s))])
